ISSUE.TITLE: [now dev] Routing edge case that works in prod, but not in dev
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This works in `now dev` and prod: ``` { "src": "/(.*)", "dest": "/www/$1" } ``` However, this __does not work__ in `now dev`, but it works in prod: ``` { "src": "(.*)", "dest": "/www$1" } ```
